item.title: Benchmarks
item.description: Here are the results of the comparison between FireDucks and pandas using TPCx-BB and TPC-H, benchmarks that include a lot of processing related to data analysis. The results are shown below. These benchmarks include various data analysis workloads called queries. This comparison compares the pandas implementation of those queries with the FireDucks implementation using the FireDucks import hook. The graphs show a comparison of the FireDucks run using pandas versus FireDucks.
